content: I obtained my Ph.D from Indian Institute of Technology Delhi, India under the supervision of Prof. Brejesh Lall in 2019. I am working at the Centre for Development of Advanced Computing (C-DAC), Noida, India where I currently lead R&D initiatives in developing novel machine learning and computer vision algorithms for healthcare applications.
